markdown:
The 'release calendar' is where you will be able to find out when our statistics are released and sign-up to receive notifications.

We are still developing the calendar functionality but [you can view a prototype of it][1]. **This is a different website and you should return to [beta.ons.gov.uk][2] after viewing.**

For up to date ONS release information please check the [main ONS website calendar][3].

You can find Government wide release information for statistics on the [GOV.UK website][4].


  [1]: http://onsdigital.github.io/pattern-library/templates/html/t11.html
  [2]: http://beta.ons.gov.uk
  [3]: http://www.ons.gov.uk/ons/release-calendar/index.html
  [4]: https://www.gov.uk/government/statistics
